t: Amazon.com: Life Changes[LP]: CDs & Vinyl
s: Great quality vinyl which came in very nice packaging. ... Love love love! A must listen! This album is perfect-a combination of his original album with real, country music, and his newer, more peppier sound. I've listened to this probably 100 times already, and still love it! This is hands down Thomas Rhett...
